General.Name: Viscom AG
General.Description: Viscom AG develops, manufactures, and sells inspection systems for industrial production applications in Europe, the Americas, Asia, and internationally. It provides solder paste, optical, conformal coating, X-ray, battery, and bond inspection systems, as well as software solutions. The company also offers reconstruction and modernization services, as well as application support, training, and maintenance services. Its inspection solutions are used in various industries, such as automotive electronics, aerospace engineering, industrial and consumer electronics, medical technology, telecommunications, and energy storage. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hanover, Germany. Viscom AG is a subsidiary of HPC Vermögensverwaltung GmbH.
